package.name: iOS Microsoft Word
package.releaseNotes: • Anonymous file sharing for iPhone and iPad: Anonymous file sharing has arrived on iPhone and iPad. Your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint collaborators can now open and view files that you have shared with them on their iPhone and iPad devices, without the need to sign in. A Microsoft account is still required for editing and commenting.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Excel
package.releaseNotes: • Anonymous file sharing for iPhone and iPad: Anonymous file sharing has arrived on iPhone and iPad. Your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint collaborators can now open and view files that you have shared with them on their iPhone and iPad devices, without the need to sign in. A Microsoft account is still required for editing and commenting.

package.name: iOS Microsoft PowerPoint
package.releaseNotes: • Anonymous file sharing for iPhone and iPad: Anonymous file sharing has arrived on iPhone and iPad. Your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint collaborators can now open and view files that you have shared with them on their iPhone and iPad devices, without the need to sign in. A Microsoft account is still required for editing and commenting.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Outlook
package.releaseNotes:
This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes to make Outlook better for you.
Feel free to send us any comments or questions by going to Settings > Help & Feedback – we’d love to hear from you.

package.name: iOS Microsoft OneNote
package.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.
Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience.
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app (OneNote->Settings->Send Feedback) Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

package.name: iOS Microsoft OneDrive
package.releaseNotes: This update contains bug fixes and stability improvements.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Windows App Mobile
package.releaseNotes: Now you can seamlessly share files between your PC and iPhone. You can set up file sharing by linking your iPhone to your Microsoft account.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Defender Security
package.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and improvements

package.name: iOS Microsoft Copilot
package.releaseNotes: Welcome to Microsoft Edge! Check out what's new in this release: • Custom app icon available: Celebrate Microsoft's 50th anniversary with a custom app icon. • New widget available: Jump into the Surf Game right from your home screen. • What's New: Curious about what’s fresh? Check out the latest features in the Settings > What's New section! • Bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements. Upgrade to the latest version and enjoy a smarter, more efficient Microsoft Edge!

package.name: iOS Microsoft Loop
package.releaseNotes: • We've grouped your Ideas pages into a dedicated workspace, making it easier to keep them organized. For work accounts, we’ve also added a personal workspace where you can work in private and capture thoughts visible only to you.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Warehouse Management
package.releaseNotes: This version of the Warehouse Management mobile app introduces the following fixes and improvements: •Fixed an issue that affected the connection on devices.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Store Commerce
package.releaseNotes: This update adds the option to set different notification preferences for each store. In Orders and Products, your filters stay around as you move through the app, and we've fixed a crash that could happen when you choose pictures for your products. Payments is improved too, with support for Puerto Rico in WooPayments, and better accessibility.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales
package.releaseNotes: This version includes experience improvements and bug fixes so sellers can stay on top of their deals better than ever before.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Lists
package.releaseNotes: • Anonymous file sharing for iPhone and iPad: Anonymous file sharing has arrived on iPhone and iPad. Your Word, Excel, and PowerPoint collaborators can now open and view files that you have shared with them on their iPhone and iPad devices, without the need to sign in. A Microsoft account is still required for editing and commenting.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Dynamics 365 Field Service
package.releaseNotes: Minor updates, bug fixes, and performance improvements.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Viva Engage
package.releaseNotes: We've improved the stability of Viva Engage in this release. We hope you enjoy it!

package.name: iOS Microsoft Whiteboard
package.releaseNotes: Fixed known bugs.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Edge AI Browser
package.releaseNotes: Welcome to Microsoft Edge! Check out what's new in this release: • Custom app icon available: Celebrate Microsoft's 50th anniversary with a custom app icon. • New widget available: Jump into the Surf Game right from your home screen. • What's New: Curious about what’s fresh? Check out the latest features in the Settings > What's New section! • Bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements. Upgrade to the latest version and enjoy a smarter, more efficient Microsoft Edge!

package.name: iOS Microsoft Seeing AI
package.releaseNotes: This release includes several bug fixes to make your experience even better.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Planner
package.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Azure
package.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using the Azure app. Our regular updates include performance improvements and bug fixes to make the app faster and more reliable.
Please reach out to us for any questions, concerns, or feature requests.

package.name: iOS Microsoft To-Do
package.releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs to improve the app experience.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Teams
package.releaseNotes: Skype is retiring in May 2025. Sign in to Microsoft Teams Free with your Skype credentials, and your chats and contacts will be right where you left them. Enjoy the features you love about Skype, including free calling and messaging, as well as new features like meetings and communities, all in Teams. If you don't want to use Microsoft Teams Free, you can export your Skype data.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Sharepoint
package.releaseNotes: Stability improvements and fixes.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central
package.releaseNotes: Added support for latest mobile OS, added support for barcode scanning, updated internal components, fixed minor issues.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Power Apps
package.releaseNotes: • Bug fixes and performance improvements

package.name: iOS Microsoft Authenticator
package.releaseNotes: We're always working on new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements. Make sure you stay updated with the latest version for the best authentication experience.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Advertising
package.releaseNotes: With the latest release, the app now supports the Simplified Chinese language and locale formatting.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Lens PDF Scanner
package.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements

package.name: iOS Microsoft Work Folders
package.releaseNotes: • Bug Fixes

package.name: iOS Microsoft Power BI
package.releaseNotes: - Improved stability and fixed various bugs.​

package.name: iOS Microsoft 365 Admin
package.releaseNotes: This release contains few bug fixes to improve the app reliability.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Intune Company Portal
package.releaseNotes: We’ve been improving the stability of the Company Portal. This helps keep your information safe and makes the app work more efficiently.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Azure Information Protection
package.releaseNotes: Intune Fixes
